includedAssets.title: Thanks For The Memories
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep1 - Thanks For The Memories
includedAssets.synopsis: Still reeling from the events of the third season finale, the team drop everything to find a way to get Nick his powers back.

includedAssets.synopsis: While the Gedächtnis Esser remains at large, Renard's mother arrives at the hospital in an attempt to save his life.

includedAssets.title: The Last Fight
includedAssets.synopsis: Monroe and Rosalee get some much needed help as they try to restore Nick's powers, while he and Hank look into goings-on at a Wesen boxing gym.

includedAssets.title: Dyin On A Prayer
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep4 - Dyin On A Prayer
includedAssets.synopsis: Soon after a rabbi summons then loses control of a Golem, Nick and Hank are called to investigate the suspicious death of a familiar Wesen.

includedAssets.title: You Don't Know Jack

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: David Giuntoli stars in the fourth season of this detective fantasy drama. As the team try everything to find a way to restore his powers, Nick begins to consider whether the life of a Grimm is really the one he wants.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: David Giuntoli stars in the fourth season of this fantasy drama. As the team try to restore his powers, Nick considers whether he wants to be a Grimm.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: David Giuntoli stars in the fourth season of this detective fantasy drama. As the team try everything to find a way to restore his powers, Nick begins to consider whether the life of a Grimm is really the one he wants.

includedIn.title: Grimm
includedIn.synopsis: Homicide detective Nick Burkhardt discovers he is the latest in a long line of protectors known as “Grimms”, tasked with guarding humanity from dangerous mythological creatures.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Homicide detective Nick Burkhardt discovers he is a “Grimm”: a guardian tasked with protecting humanity from dangerous mythological creatures.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Homicide detective Nick Burkhardt discovers he is the latest in a long line of protectors known as “Grimms”, tasked with guarding humanity from dangerous mythological creatures.
